page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF NATALIE
page.content: My alarm clock wakes me at 8 o'clock,but I don't always get up staight away.My breakfast is usually toast and tea,and after I help my mother to get my little brother ready for school,as she has to leave for work. At about 8.40 I walk down and meet my friends and we have a gossip in the yard before school starts.I quite like school work especially English.At break times we either play games like hopscotch or chasing or just sit and talk. After school I go staight home,have my tea and then go out to play.If it's fine I'll play on my bike,but if it's raining I may go the video shop with my friend and watch a film in her house.
